name: Mozart Mountain Dash
body:
Hello and welcome to the support page for Mozart Mountain Dash – possibly the greatest ever Mozart themed snowboarding game ever to grace the App Store.

If you’re experiencing any problems with the app or if you have any suggested improvements then please contact me: pjsamuel@live.co.uk.

It would be great if you could contact me before leaving any sort of negative review. We all want the same thing here - a fun free racer game that celebrates Mozart's (possible) love of snowboarding. So lets work together and make it happen:)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
